page.title: 04Transport - Roads
page.content: East Grinstead is a crossroads of two main routes,the A22 from London to Eastbourne,and the A264 from Crawley to Tunbridge Wells.However there are not any dual carriageways within about seven miles of the town centre.Many of the roads have recently been improved to trunk road standard,most recently the A264 Crawley M23 link.East Grinstead has some new estates and new office development,which has worsened the traffic problem on the London Road,particulary in peak hours,where traffic jams often occur between Felbridge and the town centre.The town has a one way system,and this and the relief road eases pressure on the old High Street. (see p.6 Concern About Traffic) By Tom Brophy
